item.title: FT Most Read: Saturday, July 13, 2024 at 11:10 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Democrats in disarray over Biden: ‘We’re totally, totally screwed’
2. Starmer’s relegation of 31 Labour MPs and peers creates cohort of potential troublemakers
3. [Opinion] The brassy brilliance of Angela Rayner 
4. Rudy Giuliani’s bankruptcy case thrown out by US judge
5. Top US House Democrat meets with Biden over re-election doubts
